page.title: 05WORRIES
page.content: Most people thought transport was the worst local problem.The Government came second which includes reparing bad roads, drainage and pollution. A few people thought that unemployment and visitors were problems. Unemployment was the biggest concern for Britain followed by war with things like nuclear bombs. Some people thought that drugs and over population were problems. Starvation was by far the biggest concern worldwide. Violence and terrorism came next. A few people though that war and over population were worries. Burglaries were the only crime problem for Oulton Broad. Most people thought that newcomers fitted in well. Fish is the most popular local food. A third crossing over the river has caught people's attention.
